tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audience_segmentation (
  audience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audience_name VARCHAR(255),
  age_range VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  interests VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE AudienceMembers ( 
    member_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    segment_id UUID REFERENCES AudienceSegments(segment_id), 
    member_name VARCHAR(100), 
    email VARCHAR(100), 
    age INT, 
    gender VARCHAR(10) 
);

CREATE TABLE SegmentMembership (
    member_id INT,
    segment_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (member_id, segment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES AudienceSegments(segment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE audience_members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(255),
    member_email VARCHAR(255),
    segment_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES audience_segments(segment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    member_id INT,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    income DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES audience_members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE location_data (
    member_id INT,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    postal_code VARCHAR(10),
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES audience_members(member_id)
);
